"Gun control" can also be used to mean hitting your target
/* United States */ also no reason for limit to be in quotes
/* United States */ no reason for 'bans' to be in quotes
/* District of Columbia v Heller */ The U.S. Constitution is NOT a code; therefore, it does NOT "codify" anything. The Constitution is the sumpreme law, not code. A code is a regulation, not law.

/* District of Columbia v HellerFor more information on the case, see District of Columbia v. Heller */ fix header
/* United States */ Makes more sense to have the "Background" first!

/* United States */ Heller makes it clear that owning a gun is a right under the Constitution, not a belief or feeling.
/* United States */ No. The court has ruled on this issue and they have upheld the RIGHT to own a gun.
